about_the_game:
Set in the sci-fi-fantasy world of Aurellia in the year 20XX, you'll build decks featuring cards from all across the world; uncovering lore through every card, combining unique mechanics and elemental combinations to dominate the battlefield. Explore different play-styles, master the elements, and devise strategies to keep the flow of battle in your favour. 

  • Casual & Ranked PvP

    Battle against opponents causally or competitively. Ranked seasons will be every 3 months, so craft powerful decks, crush your opponents and climb the ladder.

  • Elemental Combat

    Build decks picking from any of the 7 elements to create endless and unique combos. Some cards feature dual-typing which open up an array of more combinations and deck building opportunities.

  • Conversion System

    The "Conversion System" is a unique battle system that allows you to change any card's element on the fly using abilities or support cards that trigger the "conversion mechanic". Turn the tide of combat by changing your element offensively or defensively.

  • Weakness & Resistance System

    Leverage the elemental advantage by attacking an enemy's elemental weaknesses, or bolster your defences by changing your element to resist the opponent's element.

  • The Void Pile

    The Void Pile is a shared zone where cards are sent via card effect. Use card abilities or effects to use your opponent's cards against them and unleash even more combo potential.

  • Deep and Rich Customization

    We've removed the limiters on customization, allowing you to customize mats, card borders, border colors, card skins, card backs, and even unlock unique VFX cosmetics, and more. 

  • Story Mode

    Uncover the lore of Gear Slayer through the PvE story mode. You'll travel the different regions of Aurellia, unlock new heroes, face-off against powerful enemies, and go head to head with "Void Raids".

  • Arcade Modes

    We will be continually releasing new and exciting arcade modes, adding layers to the existing gameplay, and giving you more ways to play. 

And more....

  • Factions & Faction Leaderboards

  • Daily & Weekly Mission System

  • Promo Cards & Special In-game Events

content_descriptors.notes: Mature content of our game is limited only to somewhat revealing outfits for female characters. We do not display any explicit nudity across the game.

short_description: A free-to-play anime-style multiplayer trading card game set in the sci-fi fantasy world of Aurellia; featuring epic elemental combat and vast deck building.

*languages with full audio support
